Name.label: Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy and renal tubular disease due to mitochondrial DNA mutation
Mitochondrial oxidative phosphorylation disorder due to a point mutation of mitochondrial DNA

TextSection.Contents: A mitochondrial oxidative phosphorylation disorder characterized by hypertrophic and dilated cardiomyopathy, failure to thrive, myopathy with generalized hypotonia and increased creatine kinase, developmental delay and/or regression with cerebral atrophy on brain MRI, renal manifestations including chronic renal failure, renal tubular acidosis and lactic acidosis. Additional clinical features include seizures and respiratory failure.

Synonym.label: Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy and renal tubular disease due to mtDNA mutation
